summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing titles, reallocating, reclassifying, redesignating, retitling, and setting compensation for certain positions in various City departments; creating new salary rates; correcting APEX market group rates on Ordinance \#119212; correcting a position number as shown on Ordinance \#119167; amending S.M.C. 4.13.010 by a 2/3 vote of the Council to exempt an additonal position from the classified service; and providing payment therefor.
